name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with a robust focus on **Python**, **Machine Learning**, and **Data Pipelines**. Bringing 13+ years of full-stack development experience, I have honed my skills in **Backend Development** and have implemented advanced distributed systems and data visualization techniques. I am proficient in deploying AI/ML-powered applications that leverage predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. 
My technical expertise encompasses **Golang**, **Rust**, and comprehensive Software Reliability Engineering practices, ensuring optimal performance and reliability in software solutions. I excel in automated testing, code review, and fostering effective communication within teams. Additionally, I have an extensive background in utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for application development, as well as deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure**. 
My collaborative experience in compliance-driven development includes aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, alongside hands-on proficiency in MLOps with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
